sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-dialog :value="true" persistent max-width="290">
    <v-card>
      <v-card-title class="text-h5"> Edit task </v-card-title>
      <v-card-text
        >Edit the title of this task:
        <v-text-field v-model="taskTitle"></v-text-field>
      </v-card-text>
      <v-card-actions>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <v-btn text @click="$emit('close')"> Cancel </v-btn>
        <v-btn
          @click="$store.dispatch('deleteTask', task.id)"
          color="red darken-1"
          text
        >
          Save
        </v-btn>
      </v-card-actions>
    </v-card>
  </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: ["task"],
  data() {
    return {
      taskTitle: null,
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style></style>
